Verses: 2 indraiyadhinamum En Angalaaippu Muranduththanamaaga Ennappadugiradhu; En Thavippaippaarkkilum En Vaadhai Kadinamaanadhu.
3 naan Avarai Enge Kandu Sandhikkalaam Enbadhai Arindhaal Nalamaayirukkum; Appozhudhu Naan Avar Aasanaththukku Munbaaga Vandhuserndhu,
4 en Nyaayaththai Avarukku Munbaaga Varisaiyaai Vaiththu, Kaariyaththai Roobikkum Vaarththaigalaal En Vaayai Nirappuven.
5 avarudaiya Marumozhigalai Naan Arindhu, Avar Enakku Solvadhai Unarndhukolluven.
6 avar Thammudaiya Magaa Vallamaiyinpadiye Ennode Vazhakkaaduvaaro? Avar Appadi Seyyaamal Enmel Dhayai Vaippaar.
7 ange Sanmaarkkan Avarode Vazhakkaadalaam; Appozhudhu Ennai Nyaayantheerkkiravarin Kaikku Endraikkum Neengalaaith Thappuviththukkolven.
8 idho, Naan Munnaagapponaalum Avar Illai; Pinnaagapponaalum Avaraik Kaanen.
9 idadhupuraththil Avar Kiriyaiseydhum Avaraik Kaanen; Valadhupuraththilum Naan Avaraik Kaanaadhapadikku Oliththirukkiraar.
10 aanaalum Naan Pogum Vazhiyai Avar Arivaar; Avar Ennai Sodhiththapin Naan Ponnaaga Vilanguven.
11 en Kaalgal Avar Adigalaip Patrippidiththadhu; Avarudaiya Neriyaivittu Naan Saayaamal Adhaik Kaikkonden.
12 avar Udhadugalin Karpanaigalai Vittu Naan Pinvaanguvadhillai; Avarudaiya Vaayin Vaarththaigalai Enakku Vendiya Aagaaraththaip Paarkkilum Adhigamaaik Kaaththukkonden.
13 avarovendraal Ore Manamaayirukkiraar; Avaraith Thiruppaththakkavar Yaar? Avarudaiya Siththaththinpadiyellaam Seyvaar.
14 enakkuk Kuriththirukkiradhai Avar Niraivetruvaar; Ippadippattavaigal Innum Anegam Avaridaththil Undu.
15 aagaiyaal Avarukku Munbaagak Kalangugiren; Naan Sindhikkirapodhu, Avarukku Bayappadugiren.
16 dhevan En Irudhayaththai Ilakkarikkappanninaar; Sarvavallavar Ennaik Kalangappanninaar.
17 andhagaaram Varaadhadharku Munne Naan Sangarikkappadaamalum, Irulai Avar Enakku Maraikkaamalumponadhinaal Ippadiyirukkiren.
